name: MobiZest
overview:
MobiZest is a full service marketing agency that is based in the UK and specialises in mobile. MobiZest focuses on providing outsourced marketing services to companies operating in the mobile sector with a special emphasis on helping companies increase their marketing presence in Europe.

MobiZest’s founders have worked internationally with many small to medium companies who operate in the mobile sector and want to rapidly increase their B2B or B2C awareness in Europe. The mix of marketing services offered encompasses marketing strategy as well as tactical execution from mobile marketing through to PR and creation of marketing collateral.
